outputFile.comment: The path to save the generated image
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image. Default is 480
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image. Default is 320
sleepInterval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
colorBackground.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorTextFG.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorTextDark.comment: The color of the account detail text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorLine.comment: The color of the line dividing the subheader from user records expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
redisServer.comment: The hostname of the redis server. Default `localhost`
redisPort.comment: The port the redis server is running on. Default 6379
redisDb.comment: The redis database to load. Default 0
enableUserDetails.comment: Indicates whether user details should be output to the image (create date, hub fees, txs)
enableLogDetails.comment: Indicates whether the debug info should be printed out
aliases: Use key value pairs to provide aliases to user accounts in the database
